label: Is Just Back And Forth Change Shot
def_question: Does the video have a clear subject with back-and-forth changes in shot size?
alt_question: Does the shot size alternate between closer and farther views?
Does the framing repeatedly shift between different sizes?
Is there an oscillating pattern in the shot size?
Does the framing alternate between different scales?
def_prompt: The video has a clear subject with back-and-forth changes in shot size.
alt_prompt: A video with oscillating shot sizes.
A video featuring alternating frame scales.
A shot with patterned size variations.
